item.description:
Another special Cuban event! Marleny will host us at the restaurant Azucar on Franklin Street in Hartford. For info on the restaurant, go to:
http://azucar.helinde...

Marleny writes:
They will make Cuban food as a buffet (we will try different dishes). The $15 per person price includes soda. Also we will have an instructor for salsa and music will be there for us.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Spanish Language May Meetup
